titleStmt.title: Samaritanism reviv'd, a sermon preached at the parish church of Great Yarmouth, upon the ninth of September being the day appointed for a solemn thanksgiving for the discovery of the late horrid plot, against His Majesty's person and government / by Luke Milbourne.
titleStmt.author: Milbourne, Luke, 1649-1720.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Roycroft, for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
